Name: Wild Ride
About the game: Overview Wild Ride is a fast-paced, great looking vehicle combat game where you are the one in control of the battlefield, sit behind the wheel of your ride and be quick and smart or someone else will take you out. Will you be the ultimate rider? Wild Ride is a vehicular combat game made in Unity game engine presenting it's (1)possibilites and visuals . Wild Ride is (2)abolutely not Pay-To-Win in any aspect , and never will be ! Many maps in-game (and coming) , number of vehicles and amazing real-life like driving mechanics including drifting or even aerial jumps and stunts ! ~Wild Ride is certainly the game you're looking for!~ Features at early access launch: 3 maps! 3 different vehicles! and more! Future Features: New Maps! Multiplayer System! Skins! New Weapons! New Vehicles! And more! Got any problems? We've got you! Join our discord server to get the fastest response! Us helping you is our duty for your best experience! if you find something that is not right don't hesitate to contact us!
